1.details: Aqua’s damaging abilities applies PASSIVE on the enemy Hero. Once the first stack is applied, Aqua and her ally’s basic attacks or abilities also stack up PASSIVE. Upon reaching 4 stacks, the target will take additional magical damage (scaling with magical power) and the one who makes the last stack will heal for a small amount (scaling with magical power). Only one enemy can be affected by PASSIVE at a time

2.name: Lightning Bolt
2.details:
Aqua sends a small tidal wave in a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit and briefly slowing them.

Using QQQQQQQ while inside RRRRRRR makes the wave bigger and will knock up the enemies instead.

3.name: Electrorb
3.details:
Aqua heals a target allied Hero (scaling with magical power).

Using WWWWWWW while inside RRRRRRR heals more based on the target's missing health.

4.name: Static Link
4.details:
Aqua sends a fish to swim around, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies in contact.

Using EEEEEE while inside RRRRRRR summons a larger fish which deals more damage.

5.name: Thunder Storm
5.details:
Aqua turns the surrounding area into a water field, granting allies and herself increased movement speed.

In addition, while Aqua is on the field, all of her other abilities are also enhanced.
